dict.acceptation: 外貌，外观；出现，露面；[哲]现象；

sent.orig: The practice of appearance in court comprises preparation pre appearance and appearance.
sent.trans: 出庭实务包括出庭前的准备和出席法庭。

sent.orig: Appearance: Pale in appearance with a slight lemon tinge, yet brilliantly bright.
sent.trans: 评语：颜色：淡淡的带有微少的柠檬色泽，且非常透彻明亮。

sent.orig: Appearance Design Patent ---- suitable for those emphasize on appearance with new aesthetic feeling.
sent.trans: 外观设计专利——适合只强调申请物的外部造形有新的美感。

sent.orig: Treat appearance, physiotherapy appearance to create a company as disease of a professional cervical vertebra.
sent.trans: 作为一家专业颈椎病治疗仪、理疗仪制造企业。

sent.orig: Consciousness Itself is the Truth of all appearance, disappearance, or non-appearance.
sent.trans: 所有的显现、消失及不显现的真理是觉性自身。
